entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (3)20150119
I played for a while and got passed the Luca sequence. It's
strange that it is revealed that Sin is Jecht so early and Tiddus
still doesn't even push Auron for details. Blitzball is a fun
discretization of games like soccer and basketball. I got creamed
though.

Total time: 7:02

  • Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster)

Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (2)20150118

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014)20150117
I started this and played up to the second temple. The story is
much more interesting than I remember it being. It's such a weird
thing to jump forward 1,000 years and see what is different and
what is the same. I find Yuna to be super beautiful and I can tell
my Tidus would like her! I don't remember there being so much
oogling of Lulu's breasts.

I have memories of the combat in this game being very interesting,
but so far it is pretty tame and slow. I'm using the Expert sphere
grid and don't have a good idea yet of what my plan will be.

So far the HD remastering is odd... the character animations
really suffer and a lot of the models have low polygons, so it
looks weird for them to be so crisp and high-res. The areas are
also very good looking, but also look very empty and don't have
the many layers that a more modern game would. I'm also amazed
that there's so much loading. For instance, if you are in a
village, you can go into a building instantly, but coming out gets
a loading screen. Weird!?

Total time: 4:07
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster)
  • PS3
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (6)20150116
I finished this game tonight after playing all night. The final
chapters were pretty awesome. I loved it when Loptr grabbed a meteor
from the sky! I played a little as the extra characters, did a few
Witch Trials, and did the Chapter 14 Halo farming technique so I
could look at the extra costumes.

I feel like this is a much better game than Bayonetta 1, but I
don't have the time and heart to chew it to the bone as I did with
the first game. The combat seems is basically the same, but the
rest of the game is better... the menus are nicer and the
mini-games are much, much better. Like the first one, I never
looked at the lore excerpts that you unlock. I feel like because I
am not as devoted to it, I can't rank it higher than the first
Bayo, but it is definitely up there. I hope to play it again some
day!

Total time: 14:16
  • Video Games
  • Bayonetta 2
  • WiiU
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Mario Kart 8 (WiiU, 2014) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Mario Kart 8 (WiiU, 2014) (6)20150116
We played two or three Grand Prixs. On one I got number one, but
not three first places! Argh. I feel like this game is too obvious
and there's not enough to do other than execute well.

Parents   : 2:22
Mine      : 3:04
Total time: 5:26

entry.title: Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (5)
entry.content:
Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (5)20150114
I did two chapters while watching an episode of The X-Files. It
was pretty tough to do both at the same time, because it was the
hell boss fight, the chase, and then the Balder boss fight. I only
required one continue on each boss fight, which is pretty nice for
the firs try. This game is so rad. I can "feel" that it is ending
soon.

Total time: 10:29
  • Video Games
  • Bayonetta 2
  • WiiU
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Great Expectations, starring Jeremy Irvine (2012)
entry.content:

This was a great adaptation. This is such a tragic story. I think

overall it was pretty spot on.

entry.title: Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (4)
entry.content:
Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (4)20150111
I played for two hours and got up to Chapter 11. There was a
really hard Muspelheim fight. I really like the combat in these
games, but I am increasingly annoyed at the platform/exploration
areas. I like that there is basically no consequence during them,
but I hate seeing that I've missed a fight, when I feel like I've
explored everywhere.

Total time: 9:51
  • Video Games
  • Bayonetta 2
  • WiiU
  • 2014

entry.content:

liked that Juliet looked so young though!

entry.title: Movie: Conan the Barbarian, starring Jason Momoa (2011)
entry.content:
Movie: Conan the Barbarian, starring Jason Momoa (2011)20150104
I really like the world of Conan and found this interpretation to
be really awesome. I like that there is magic, but not a lot of
it. I like how rough, but also honest Conan is. So rad.
  • Movies
  • 2011
